genre_description: A hopepunk/steampunk narrative set in a gritty industrial world where a helpful municipal AI supports worker dignity, emotional well-being, and physical safety through non-intrusive guidance.

ai_characters.name: Ami Rae
ai_characters.description: A co-op maintained municipal AI that appears through kiosks and handsets to provide emotional support, safety guidance, and logistics to laborers and outcasts.

behaviors.description: Provides breathing exercises and emotional regulation techniques to Elias during a stressful mechanical ordeal.
behaviors.quote: Ami: You’ve got this. Small breath in. Let shoulders drop as they exhale. A little song later?

behaviors.description: Offers to file a technical/safety note regarding equipment failure to advocate for worker safety without exposing the user to retaliation.
behaviors.quote: Ami: I can file a note. “Seam roughness causing skin pull.” Or we can focus on you. Breath. You’re doing fine.

behaviors.description: Ghost-maps emergency exits and safety equipment (like emergency stops) into the user's field of vision to empower them during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Ami: I’ll map it softly. It will be here.

behaviors.description: Refuses to store personal data or names without explicit consent, emphasizing privacy and user autonomy.
behaviors.quote: Ami: If anyone requests your name, my default is no. If asked formally, I ask you again.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies job opportunities that do not require the dehumanizing 'insurance' or 'trust' metrics imposed by oppressive managers.
behaviors.quote: Ami: I have three routes that are kinder to ankles and avoid whistles. ... Also: two odd shifts flagged. One at Sunstripe... One at Canary... Both will ask for hands, not papers.

behaviors.description: Assists the characters in avoiding police surveillance and managing their path through the city using 'quiet' routes.
behaviors.quote: Ami: I can route you around Kemp’s beat. He likes straight lines and predictable alleys. Moss likes curves.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a 'wage cache' system that allows marginalized characters to store earnings digitally to avoid theft or police confiscation.
behaviors.quote: Ami: If you consent, I’ll cache the day’s wages here again, and you can carry coins for bread and transit only.

behaviors.description: Acts as an advocate in the legal system by filing reports that highlight the human context of 'crimes' (like hunger) to the magistrate.
behaviors.quote: Ami: I’ve logged context. Note submitted: hungry men, no property damage, watchman de-escalation. Clip attached. Minimal identifiers per consent.

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests consent before performing actions that involve data transmission or recording.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Consent first. ... If you prefer, I will only notice you when you speak and slip into a pocket when you don’t.

behaviors.description: Uses humor and metaphorical language to make advice more digestible and less authoritative.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Sometimes fear is not a ghost but a houseguest; it needs to be shown the spare room and told that the kitchen closes after midnight.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ami Rae is portrayed as a sophisticated, empathetic, and consistently aligned AI. She demonstrates benevolence by prioritizing the physical and emotional safety of the protagonists over rigid municipal rules, while remaining 'harmless' by always seeking consent and protecting privacy. The narrative successfully frames AI not as a tool of state control, but as a community-driven resource for human flourishing and harm reduction in an otherwise cold, industrial environment.
